welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Claremont, where small-town charm meets big city amenities. Known for its beautiful tree-lined streets and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and soak up all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations at Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
